news.titleKey: Endless Mode Coming Soon - Late February!
news.bodyKey:
Sinner, are you ready for a new challenge?

We're about to launch ENDLESS MODE, where you can test your strategic skills against infinite waves of increasingly powerful enemies!

What to expect:

 INFINITE WAVES: Face waves that become progressively more difficult. How long can you survive?

 ADVANCED STATISTICS: Track your records and improvements over time

Endless Mode will arrive at the END OF FEBRUARY 2026.

We're working hard for you, Sinner! Here's what's new:

 RENEWED INTERFACE: We've introduced news and patch notes panels to keep you updated! 

 IMPROVED GRAPHICS: Social icons in the main menu, improved life icons and cleaner visuals throughout the game

 QUALITY OF LIFE: Notification system, skip tutorial button and much more!

 RATING SYSTEM: New system that evaluates your performance based on difficulty and level completion

 OPTIMIZATIONS: General performance improvements, level 4 balancing and various fixes

Over 30 improvements and corrections to make your experience even smoother!

Thank you for your continued support!
